body_content.explanation: an act of exchanging something for money:
examples: The sale of cigarettes/alcohol is forbidden.
The building company gets commission on each house sale.
I haven't made a sale all morning.
They'll drop the price rather than lose the sale.
Is this painting for sale?
Our neighbours put their house up for sale (= started to advertise that they want to sell it) last week.

body_content.explanation: the department of a company that organizes and does the selling of the company's products or services:
examples: He works in Sales.
the sales department/manager
Sales this year exceeded the total for the two previous years.

body_content.explanation: an occasion when things are sold in order to make money:
examples: a charity/Christmas/book sale
a garage/yard sale
a sale of antique furniture
a cattle sale

body_content.explanation: available to buy in a shop:
examples: On sale at record stores now.

body_content.explanation: a system by which goods are supplied to shopsand can be returned if they are not sold within a particular period of time:
examples: We can supply goods on a sale or return basis.

body_content.explanation: an occasion when goods are sold at a lower price than usual:
examples: a mid-season/end-of-season sale
a clearance/closing-down sale
I bought this in the January sales.
sale goods/prices
Can you tell me if this dress is in the sale?
